select vvm.table_name as viewName, vc.catalog_name as catalogName, vc.database_name as `schema`, vp.param_value as connectorName from hetu_tbls vvm left join hetu_dbs vc on vvm.database_id = vc.id left join hetu_catalog_params vp on vp.catalog_id = vc.id where 1 = 1
AND vc.catalog_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{catalogName}, '%')
AND vc.database_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schemaName}, '%')
AND vvm.table_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{viewName}, '%')

select vvm.table_name as viewName, vvm.type as type, vc.catalog_name as catalogName, vc.database_name as `schema`, vp.param_value as connectorName from hetu_tbls vvm left join hetu_dbs vc on vvm.database_id = vc.id left join hetu_catalog_params vp on vp.catalog_id = vc.id where 1 = 1
AND vc.catalog_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{catalogName}, '%')
AND vc.database_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schemaName}, '%')
AND vvm.table_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{viewName}, '%')
select vvm.table_name as viewName from hetu_tbls vvm left join hetu_dbs vc on vvm.database_id = vc.id where 1 = 1 and vvm.table_name = #{viewName} and vc.catalog_name = #{catalogName} limit 1
